Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at  75th/King Drive to Champlain
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses rerouted via 75th, King Dr, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage nr 75th/King Dr to Champlain

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive to Champlain.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Increased Wait Times on Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red Line service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to a Cubs game near Addison. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to a Cubs game near Addison.

Crews are working to accommodate all passengers and restore normal service as quickly as is possible.
